Name: Feral Aggression
Raw Description:
When you use Demoralizing Roar, add an additional {dice red 1} {dice green 1} to dice pool.

Ferocious Bite instead allows you to change one {dice red,blue 1} into a {dice red 1 8} for each Energy you spend.

Name: Nature's Grasp
Raw Description:
End of your Dice Pool step:

You may reroll any number of {dice green 1} once.

These dice may also be rerolled during your Reroll step using your Reroll value.

Name: Ferocity
Raw Description: Bear Form and Cat Form also gain REROLL +1 and ATTRITION +1.

Name: Vengeance
Raw Description:
End of your Place Tokens step:

You may move up to 5 hit tokens from the attrition box into the defense box.

Name: Improved Tranquility
Raw Description: When you use Tranquility, each friendly participating character regains 2 Energy and 1 Health.

Name: Innervate
Raw Description: The Energy costs of all your instant powers are lowered by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Name: Blood Frenzy
Raw Description:
End of your Place Tokens step:

You may unequip Cat Form to move up to 10 hit tokens in the attrition box into the damage box.

Name: Weapon Balance
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

If you have a Mace or Staff equipped, you may roll an additional {dice red 1} for each {dice red 1 7+} you spot.

Name: Hurricane
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

Place 2 hit tokens in the attrition box for each opponent in combat.

Name: Moonglow
Raw Description: Lower the energy cost of Wrath, Moonfire, Starfire, Rejuvenation, and Healing Touch by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Name: Furor
Raw Description:
Start of the combat round:

If you have a Beast Form equipped, you may replace it with another Beast Form. Regain 1 Energy when you replace Beast Forms.

If you do not have a Beast Form equipped, you may equip one.

Name: Nature's Grace
Raw Description:
The first time you use Rejuvenation during each combat, you do not have to unequip it.

You may use Moonfire twice in the same combat round.

Name: Improved Rejuvenation
Raw Description: When you use Rejuvenation, the chosen character regains up to an additional 2 Health.

Name: Feline Swiftness
Raw Description:
You must have Cat Form equipped to use this talent.

During your Travel action:

You may move one additional region. Then unequip Cat Form.

Name: Reflection
Raw Description:
Start of your action:

Gain 1 Energy.

At the end of your faction turn, lose any Energy in excess of your capacity.

Name: Gift of Nature
Raw Description: When you use Rejuvenation, Healing Touch, or Tranquility, place 1 armor token in the defense box.

Name: Omen of Clarity
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

If you have a Mace or a Staff equipped, you may regain 1 Energy for each {dice red 1 7+} you spot.

Name: Moonfury
Raw Description:
Moonfire adds an additional {dice blue 1} to your dice pool.

When you use Starfire, you also gain ATTRITION+3.

Name: Strength of the Wild
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

If your Bear Form or Cat Form is equipped, you may place 1 hit token in the damage box or defense box for each {dice red 1 8} you spot.

Name: Thick Hide
Raw Description: Bear Form adds an additional {dice green 2} to your dice pool.

Name: Leader of the Pack
Raw Description: If Cat Form or Bear Form is equipped, each friendly participating character may add {dice red 1}{dice blue 1} to his dice pool.

Name: Heart of the Wild
Raw Description:
If Cat Form is equipped, your Energy capacity is increased by 2.

If Bear Form is equipped, your Health capacity is increased by 2.
